summary: small txt file listing some information about locations of deleted nav meshes and what nav meshes to replace default with to be used with nav mesh guide on http://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/topic/3337-skyrim-fixing-navmesh-deletion-using-tes5edit/ and best used with deleted nav mesh filter script in lastest tes5edit.
descriptionHtml:
small txt file listing some information about locations of deleted nav meshes and what nav meshes to replace default with to be used with nav mesh guide on http://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/topic/3337-skyrim-fixing-navmesh-deletion-using-tes5edit/ and best used with deleted nav mesh filter script in lastest tes5edit. Follow at your own danger no warrenties and not tested atm if stable edits or if few restored nav meshes cause any problems (ones I could not find new nev mesh to replace with)

Still a few issues but should at least be helpful advice for what to do for the few that dont have replacement in dlc would be appreciated.
Here is my personal mini guide for aiding in fixing the issues (mainly to reduce likelyhold of ctd if a plugin refs the deleted nav mesh):
in cell records
[NAVM:000CB4F3] (in GRUP Cell Temporary Children of WhiterunBreezehome "Breezehome" [CELL:000165A8]) in heartfire
world records
[NAVM:000F0660] (in GRUP Cell Temporary Children of BYOHHouse1Exterior02 [CELL:00009BD6] (in Tamriel "Skyrim" [WRLD:0000003C] at -3,-17)) in heartfire
